name.ja: <ruby>射<rt>しゃ</rt></ruby><ruby>出<rt>しゅつ</rt></ruby>のカタパルト・タートル

summoning_condition.en: If you have no Attack Position monsters on your field, you can Special Summon this card from your hand face-up to your field.

requirement.en: Send 1 face-up Fusion Monster from your field to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field. Then, if you have "Gaia the Dragon Champion" in your Graveyard, you can destroy 1 card on your opponent's field.
